snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama spoke to U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-Moon on Monday and agreed the international community had to step up its effort to "decisively address the Ebola crisis," the White House said....

headline.print_headline: Obama Urges More Action to Fight Ebola Crisis
headline.main: Obama Urges More Action to Fight Ebola Crisis

lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama spoke to U.N. Secretary General Ban Ki-Moon on Monday and agreed the international community had to step up its effort to "decisively address the Ebola crisis," the White House said.
